rukus.text: Kana kuti avo vanechirwere mumoyo yavo (cheunyengedzi), vanofunga kuti Allah havasi kuzoburitsa pachena zvido zvakaipa zvavo zvakavanzika
Dai taida, tingadai takavaratidza kwamuri, uye dai hwakavaziva nezviratidzo zvavo; asi chokwadi uchavaziva nokuda kwemataurirwo avo! Uye Allah vanoziva mabasa avo ose
Uye chokwadi tichakuedzai kusvikira taziva avo vanoshinga munzira yaAllah uye vane tariro, uye tichaedza humboo hwenyu (ari kunyepa uye ari pachokwadi)

Zvirokwazvo, avo vasingatendi, uye vanorambidza vanhu nzira yaAllah (Islaam), uye vanopikisa mutumwa (Muhammad (SAW)) mushure mokunge kutungamirwa kwauya pachena kwavari, havasi kana kurwadzisa Allah, uye vachaita (Allah) mabasa avo ave asina maturo
Imi vanotenda! Teererai Allah, uye moteerera mutumwa (Muhammad (SAW)), uye musaite mabasa enyu ave asina maturo
Zvirokwazvo, avo vasingatendi, uye vanorambidza vanhu nzira yaAllah (Islaam); uye vobva vafa vasingatendi, Allah havasi kuzovaregerera
Naizvozvo musanete kana kudaidzira runyararo imi muine mukana wepamusoro. Allah vanemi, uye havambodzikisa mugove wemabasa enyu

Zvirokwazvo, hupenyu hwenyika ino kutamba chete nekufambisa nguva. Asi kana imi mukatenda (muhumwechete waAllah) nekuvatya nekusiya zvakaipa, vachakupai mugove wenyu, uye havambokukumbirai upfumi hwenyu
Dai vakakumbirai, vobva vaomesa, maizoomera. Uye vachaburitsa pachena zvido zvenyu zvakashata

Tarisai! Ndimi avo vari kudaidzwa kuti mushandise (hupfumi) hwenyu munzira yaAllah, asi mukati menyu mune vamwe vakaomera. Uye uyo akaomera, zvirokwazvo akaomera iye pachake. Asi Allah mupfumi, uye imi muri varombo. Uye kana mukafuratira (Islaam nekuteerera Allah), vachakutsivai nevamwe vanhu vasiri imi, uye havazoiti semi
